file_content.text: No! Hold up, hold up! Look, I was wrong. What they're saying about you... totally true. So... strong. I don't wanna die!
Ask for no mercy and expect none. Die like a Sith!
You earned this. [Kill him]
Don't cross me again.
I'm afraid it's a little late for begging. What will you give me to let you live?
Then buy your life.
Here, I've... got a few credits. Take 'em!
Now go.
They'll do nicely.
You won't see me again. I promise.
Thanks for making that easy. You saved me the trouble of looting your corpse.
Fool. [Kill him]
I failed you, Vemrin!
Well, look who's here. Remember me?
I never forget a face. Your name is Dolgis, right? Vemrin's boy.
Of course I do.
Very good. It's good to know the name of your killer.
What do you want?
Vemrin thought I should follow up on our earlier discussion.
Don't cross me, Dolgis.
I put myself in your way, buddy. On purpose.
Notice anything interesting? No witnesses. No witnesses means no rules.
You thought Vemrin wouldn't find out what happened? You thought Vemrin wouldn't send me?
I'm not sure what you're talking about. What happened?
This doesn't make sense.
Don't play stupid with me. Overseer Tremel's little game ends here.
I'm not intimidated.
We'll see about that, won't we?
I've heard about people like you. No sense in your head, survival instinct on the blink. You clearly have a death wish.
You want to die, stupid?
Not exactly. I got a kill wish.
No more shortcuts. No more special treatment. You're just gonna be another dead failure on Korriban.
I got nothing to say to you.
You supposed to be here?
